channel.title: bathroom on DIYDeveloper.io
channel.description: Recent content in bathroom on DIYDeveloper.io

item.title: Bathroom Vanity Ikea Hack
item.description: 2 weeks ago I decided my pink 80's vanity had to go. It occupies a 1680mm space in the "powder room", which is not exactly a standard size for a vanity unit. Ikea to the rescue. Having installed an Ikea kitchen before, I had an idea of the pain and suffering that was to come. The cabinets are decent, but do have some oddities. For example, Ikea vanity drawers are not solid, they use a weird slat system.

item.title: How to replace your exhaust fan
item.description: Is your old exhaust fan too noisy? does it let cold air through from your ceiling cavity? Exhaust fans are easy to replace. I’ll show you how.
